column5: This is the perfect location for your fun-filled Padre Island getaway.  Our properties at Village by the Beach offer first class living on the Texas Gulf Coast. Our great location provides easy access to swimming, fishing, surfing, Schlitterbahn, & many restaurants.  Positioned minutes from the beach as well as access to a resort style swimming pool that is fenced with a shallow area for small children. This vacation rental is a perfect fit for families or group of friends.
column8: Relax at Village By The Beach - Haleiwa
